item.title: An American Pope: Welcome Leo XIV
item.description: We hope Leo XIV brings peace within the church even as he calls for peace outside of it.

item.title: With Brian Kemp Out for 2026, Georgia Is on My Mind
item.description: Instead of asking why Kemp wouldn’t want to run for Senate, it makes more sense to ask why he would.

item.title: The Consumer Financial Protection Bureau Must Go
item.description: The law finally demands that the CFPB, after over a decade in existence as an exception to the Constitution, be defunded.

item.title: V-E Day Should Be a Day of Celebration, Not Solemn Remembrance
item.description: America’s irreplaceable contribution to winning that world war and preventing another deserves to be the object of adoration.

item.title: Battle of the Shiloh Hendrix Fundraisers
item.description: The online controversy is a proxy fight in the culture war.
